articles.title: Antibiotic resistance: A disaster in the making - Deccan Herald

articles.author: Shivanshi Tomer
articles.title: How to make Fermented Honey Garlic to boost immunity - Recipes
articles.description: Fermented Honey Garlic is a delicious and powerful way to give a boost to your immunity. Here is how you can make this remedy with just two simple ingredients.
articles.content: After every two days, turn the bottle upside down to ensure proper fermentation. You can also give it a stir or a shake.
